We’ve got a variety of makeup courses to match your passion and career goals! Here’s a quick rundown:

15-Day Courses:
      1. Personal Makeup Artistry & Hair Designing Certificate
      2. International Certificate in Advanced Creative Effects Artistry
      3. International Certificate in Page-3 Makeup Artistry

Our makeup courses are designed to give you the skills and certifications needed to shine in the beauty industry. Here’s the list:

15-Day Courses:
      1. Personal Makeup Artistry & Hair Designing Certificate
      2. International Certificate in Advanced Creative Effects Artistry
      3. International Certificate in Page-3 Makeup Artistry

1-3 Month Courses:
      1. International Certificate Pro-Makeup Artistry (1 Month)
      2. International Certificate in Advanced Makeup Artistry (2 Months)
      3. International Certificate in Bridal Aesthetics Artistry (3 Months)

4-6 Month Courses:
      1. International Diploma in Advanced Makeup Artistry (4 Months)
      2. International Graduate in Advanced Makeup Artistry (5 Months)
      3. International Master in Ultra Makeup Artistry (6 Months)
